ess-beta-metadata.label: Level 3 or above qualifications (Northern Ireland)
ess-beta-metadata.subtitle: Percentage of people aged 16 to 64 with Level 3 or above qualifications
ess-beta-metadata.sourceOrg: Northern Ireland Statistics and Research Agency
ess-beta-metadata.longDescription: This indicator shows the percentage of the population aged 16 to 64 with Regulated Qualifications Framework (RQF) level 3+ qualifications, in Northern Ireland, for 2016 to 2023.
ess-beta-metadata.caveats: Updates to this indicator have been temporarily suspended until the APS reweighting is implemented in 2026.
